title: 30k-Mile 1976 Cadillac Eldorado Convertible
description: This 1976 Cadillac Eldorado Convertible is powered by a 500ci V8 paired with a three-speed automatic transmission and is finished in Greenbrier Firemist over White Sierra Grain leather upholstery. Equipment includes a white convertible soft top, 15" steel wheels, black wheel covers, four-wheel disc brakes, Twilight Sentinel automatic headlights, and a digital stereo as well as automatic climate control, cruise control, power windows, and a power-adjustable front bench. Acquired by the selling dealer in 2025, this Eldorado Convertible shows 30k miles and is now offered with the owner's manual, 2023 service records, and a South Carolina title.
author: bringatrailer
excerpt: Bid for the chance to own a 30k-Mile 1976 Cadillac Eldorado Convertible at auction with Bring a Trailer, the home of the best vintage and classic cars online. Lot #188,256.
text: This 1976 Cadillac Eldorado Convertible is powered by a 500ci V8 paired with a three-speed automatic transmission and is finished in Greenbrier Firemist over White Sierra Grain leather upholstery. Equipment includes a white convertible soft top, 15″ steel wheels, black wheel covers, four-wheel disc brakes, Twilight Sentinel automatic headlights, and a digital stereo as well as automatic climate control, cruise control, power windows, and a power-adjustable front bench. Acquired by the selling dealer in 2025, this Eldorado Convertible shows 30k miles and is now offered with the owner’s manual, 2023 service records, and a South Carolina title. The car was repainted in Greenbrier Firemist under prior ownership. Details include contrasting pinstriping, a power-operated white convertible soft top, a power antenna, a remote-controlled left mirror, fender-mounted light monitors, and chrome bumpers. The selling dealer notes that paint correction has been performed, a ceramic coating was applied to the finish, and there are imperfections in the paint. The 15″ steel wheels feature black covers and are mounted with 235/75 Suretrac Power Touring white-wall tires, that were installed recently. Stopping power is provided by four-wheel disc brakes. The Eldorado featured a torsion bar front suspension and a coil-sprung solid rear axle along with Automatic Level Control and power steering. Work in August 2023 consisted of flushing the brake fluid and replacing the steering gear box, ball joints, control arms, stabilizer bars, and shocks. The cabin features a power-adjustable front bench trimmed in White Sierra Grain leather, and amenities include a digital stereo as well as cruise control, automatic climate control, Twilight Sentinel automatic headlights, power door locks, and power windows. Work in August 2023 consisted of replacing the heater core and servicing the air conditioning system. The selling dealer notes that the clock does not work and the power brace is noisy during operation. The three-spoke steering wheel frames a 100-mph speedometer and a fuel level gauge. The five-digit odometer shows 30k miles. The 500ci V8 features a Rochester Quadrajet four-barrel carburetor and was factory rated at 190 horsepower and 360 lb-ft of torque. Work in August 2023 consisted of replacing the thermostat and radiator hoses. Power is sent to the front wheels through a Turbo Hydra-Matic three-speed automatic transmission. The South Carolina title carries an Antique brand. You are not connected to real-time updates. Attempting to connect. Your real-time updates could not be connected. html:
This 1976 Cadillac Eldorado Convertible is powered by a 500ci V8 paired with a three-speed automatic transmission and is finished in Greenbrier Firemist over White Sierra Grain leather upholstery. Equipment includes a white convertible soft top, 15″ steel wheels, black wheel covers, four-wheel disc brakes, Twilight Sentinel automatic headlights, and a digital stereo as well as automatic climate control, cruise control, power windows, and a power-adjustable front bench. Acquired by the selling dealer in 2025, this Eldorado Convertible shows 30k miles and is now offered with the owner’s manual, 2023 service records, and a South Carolina title.

The car was repainted in Greenbrier Firemist under prior ownership. Details include contrasting pinstriping, a power-operated white convertible soft top, a power antenna, a remote-controlled left mirror, fender-mounted light monitors, and chrome bumpers. The selling dealer notes that paint correction has been performed, a ceramic coating was applied to the finish, and there are imperfections in the paint.

The 15″ steel wheels feature black covers and are mounted with 235/75 Suretrac Power Touring white-wall tires, that were installed recently. Stopping power is provided by four-wheel disc brakes. The Eldorado featured a torsion bar front suspension and a coil-sprung solid rear axle along with Automatic Level Control and power steering. Work in August 2023 consisted of flushing the brake fluid and replacing the steering gear box, ball joints, control arms, stabilizer bars, and shocks.

The cabin features a power-adjustable front bench trimmed in White Sierra Grain leather, and amenities include a digital stereo as well as cruise control, automatic climate control, Twilight Sentinel automatic headlights, power door locks, and power windows. Work in August 2023 consisted of replacing the heater core and servicing the air conditioning system. The selling dealer notes that the clock does not work and the power brace is noisy during operation.

The three-spoke steering wheel frames a 100-mph speedometer and a fuel level gauge. The five-digit odometer shows 30k miles.

The 500ci V8 features a Rochester Quadrajet four-barrel carburetor and was factory rated at 190 horsepower and 360 lb-ft of torque. Work in August 2023 consisted of replacing the thermostat and radiator hoses.

Power is sent to the front wheels through a Turbo Hydra-Matic three-speed automatic transmission.

The South Carolina title carries an Antique brand.
